greeting.text: Hello there! Welcome to the Meeting Center! I'm Alex, your friendly Meeting Coordinator. Need to book a room, or are you looking for a meeting in progress?

options.text: I need to book a meeting room
How does the booking system work?

book-room.text: Excellent! We have three meeting rooms: Conference Room A for big presentations, the Huddle Space for quick syncs, and the Quiet Room for focused work. Each has different vibes! What kind of meeting are you planning?

conference-a.text: Conference Room A it is! It fits up to 20 people and has the BIG screen. Perfect for impressing stakeholders! *checks tablet* Looks like there's availability at 2 PM and 4 PM today. Want me to reserve it?

options.text: Let me check my calendar first

huddle-space.text: The Huddle Space is perfect for quick syncs! Standing desks, no chairs - keeps meetings SHORT. *winks* Maximum 15 minutes or the lights start flickering. Just kidding! ...Mostly.

no-chairs.text: Right?! Jordan from PM suggested it. Said meetings went from 30 minutes to 8 minutes average! People get to the point FAST when their legs are tired. Revolutionary, honestly.

options.text: I'll try the standing meeting approach!

quiet-room.text: The Quiet Room is our hidden gem. Soundproofed walls, mood lighting, and a 'Do Not Disturb' hologram. Perfect for sensitive discussions or when you just need to focus. Very popular with the AI agents for their deep thinking sessions!

ai-meetings.text: Oh absolutely! Some of them have very... intense processing sessions. One time, Axiom-7 booked it for 4 hours straight. When they came out, they'd apparently solved three optimization problems. The room was slightly warm though. *nervous laugh*

booked-success.text: Done! I've reserved it for you. You'll get a notification 15 minutes before. Pro tip: arrive early to test the screen share - it has a mind of its own sometimes. Good luck with your meeting!

check-later.text: No rush! Come back when you're ready. I'm here until 6 PM most days. And remember - the best meetings are the ones with clear agendas! *taps clipboard* That's my motto!

available-rooms.text: *checks holographic display* Right now, Conference Room A is free until 3 PM. The Huddle Space is always available - first come, first serve! And the Quiet Room... *squints* ...is occupied by someone named 'Anonymous.' Mysterious!

anonymous-booker.text: *leans in conspiratorially* Between you and me? I think it's the CEO. Or maybe an AI agent having an existential crisis. Or Chris from Sales practicing their pitch. I don't ask questions. The Quiet Room sees all, tells nothing.

booking-system.text: Easy! Just approach the room door, tap your ID badge, and the schedule pops up. Pick a time slot, confirm, done! Or talk to me - I love the human touch. Also, I have snacks hidden in my desk. Don't tell facilities.

secret-snacks.text: *opens drawer slightly* Granola bars, some cookies Morgan baked, and... emergency chocolate. For when meetings go overtime. The chocolate has saved lives. Metaphorically. Probably.

exploring.text: Feel free to look around! Check out the whiteboards - some brilliant ideas have been born there. Also some terrible drawings. We don't judge. The Meeting Center is a safe space for all ideas, good and bad!
